    <tr>
      <td colspan="2"><b>Goal</b></td>
      <td colspan="4">Add a decision in a quick manner so that many decision can be added to the system in a short period of time.</td>
    </tr>
    <tr>
      <td colspan="2"><b>Preconditions</b></td>
      <td colspan="4">The user is a member of the project for which he wants to add a decision.</td>
    </tr>
    <tr>
      <td colspan="2"><b>Basic flow</b></td>
      <td colspan="4"> 
      
<OL>
<LI>The user chooses _quick add decision_</LI>
<li>The system displays a small form with the following fields
<ul>
<li>Name text field _(required, must be unique in the project, minimum number of characters: 3)_</li>
<li>A menu that allows to select the initial state of the decision. The default initial state is selected.</li>
<LI>The user confirmes his entries with _submit_</LI>
<LI>The system saves this new decision and hides the form.</LI>
</ul>
</li>
</OL>
